text:
@Mike_Pence @VP @WhiteHouse AMERICAN CARNAGE:  Trump didn’t cause the Covid-19 pandemic, but he made it worse (blame-gaming, hyping deadly “cures,” etc.). Can we trust him to stop the bleeding? Here's how he helped hurricane victims: lobbing rolls of paper towels, for God’s sake!

https://t.co/MpueHB7lII
